main event: A civilian observed a disc shaped craft about 300 ft in diameter hovering and then moving away at a high speed in Baden, Pennsylvania on 13 August 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as brightly lit and surrounded by a shimmering haze,The craft's lights went out before it quickly accelerated,The observer reported blurred vision and a tingling sensation near the end of the sighting,No sound was emitted by the UFO during the observation,The conclusion of the report classified the incident as a hoax.
witness description: A 37-year-old civilian who reported the sighting.
